DOC.brief_summary: Lifestyle modification successfully employ polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) improve menstrual cycle fertility . Unfortunately , compliance time low . Recently , show high adherence structure exercise training ( SET ) program woman PCOS . The current study aim compare efficacy SET program diet program reproductive function obese anovulatory infertile PCOS patient .
DOC.brief_title: Structured Exercise Training Program Versus Hypocaloric Hyperproteic Diet Obese Anovulatory Infertile Patients With PCOS
DOC.detailed_description: Forty obese anovulatory infertile PCOS patient wish conceive allocate two study-groups accord desire : structured exercise training ( SET ) group ( n. 20 ) undergo SET program , whereas diet group ( n. 20 ) undertake hypocaloric hyperproteic diet . The duration study 24 week . At baseline , 12 24 week clinical , endocrine metabolic evaluation perform patient reproductive event obtain throughout study record .
DOC.criteria: PCOS Anovulatory infertility Obesity ( BMI > 30 ) Age < 18 > 35 year Neoplastic , metabolic , hepatic , renal , cardiovascular disorder concurrent medical illness Hypothyroidism , hyperprolactinemia , Cushing 's syndrome , nonclassical congenital adrenal hyperplasia Current previous ( within last six month ) use oral contraceptive , glucocorticoid , antiandrogens , ovulation induction agent , antidiabetic antiobesity drug drug know affect sex hormone level , carbohydrate metabolism , appetite Organic pelvic disease , previous pelvic surgery , suspect peritoneal factor infertility , tubal male factor infertility subfertility
